LanguageData.Giant_CheesemakerChild.title: Cheesemaster's Child
LanguageData.Giant_CheesemakerChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a child of the cheesemaker, who grew up taking care of the mammoths.
LanguageData.Giant_SlothhunterChild.title: Slothhunter's Child
LanguageData.Giant_SlothhunterChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] learned many skills from [PAWN_possessive] parents as [PAWN_pronoun] followed them to megatheria hunt.
LanguageData.Giant_SlaveGiant.title: Slave of Tinyman
LanguageData.Giant_SlaveGiant.baseDescription: Unfortunate fate of [PAWN_nameDef] begun when [PAWN_pronoun] was captured by tiny people.
LanguageData.Giant_NomadicGiantsChild.title: Child of Nomadic Giants
LanguageData.Giant_NomadicGiantsChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born from a small nomadic giant tribe, where [PAWN_pronoun] learned to hunt faster prey.
LanguageData.Giant_SquireGiant.title: Giant Squire
LanguageData.Giant_SquireGiant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to fight from the giant warriors as their young servant.
LanguageData.Giant_PlainsGiantsChild.title: Child of Great Plains Giant
LanguageData.Giant_PlainsGiantsChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has lived on land of the Great Plains.
LanguageData.Giant_YoungGiantSoldier.title: Young Giant Soldier
LanguageData.Giant_YoungGiantSoldier.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] followed grown-ups into the wars from an early age.
LanguageData.Giant_GiantismGiant.title: Giant with Giantism
LanguageData.Giant_GiantismGiant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is giant, even for a giant!
LanguageData.WeedChewer.title: Grass Chewer
LanguageData.WeedChewer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is crazed about chewing on weed and leaves.
LanguageData.WoodSwallower.title: Wood Swallower
LanguageData.WoodSwallower.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a big eater, who can even swallow a whole tree!
LanguageData.SendChewer.title: Sand Chewer
LanguageData.SendChewer.baseDescription: The crunching sound of chewing sand always pleases [PAWN_nameDef].
LanguageData.RockSwallower.title: Boudler Swallower
LanguageData.RockSwallower.baseDescription: With a firm trust in [PAWN_possessive] stomach, [PAWN_nameDef] often swallows a whole chunk of boulder!
LanguageData.StoneStacker.title: Rock Stacker
LanguageData.StoneStacker.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is known amongst [PAWN_possessive] fellow giants for the talent for stacking rocks.
LanguageData.RhinoButcher.title: Rhino Butcher
LanguageData.RhinoButcher.baseDescription: The ability to cut through the thick leather of rhinoceros is the proof that [PAWN_nameDef] spent many days studying it.
LanguageData.CheeseMaster.title: Cheesemaster
LanguageData.CheeseMaster.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an admirable cook capable of making excellent femented goodies from animal milk!
LanguageData.PillarThrower.title: Pillar Thrower
LanguageData.PillarThrower.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an expert at Pillar Throwing, a traditional game of the Giants.
LanguageData.SlothHunter.title: Sloth Hunter
LanguageData.SlothHunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an outstanding hunter who has perfected [PAWN_possessive] observation of megatheria.
LanguageData.ManHunter.title: Manhunter
LanguageData.ManHunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a gourmet who preys on weaker and smaller race.
LanguageData.ThrumboHunter.title: Thrumbo Hunter
LanguageData.ThrumboHunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the awe-inducing thrumbo hunters. They are highly admired by other Giants.
LanguageData.BugHunter.title: Bug Hunter
LanguageData.BugHunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent many days hunting huge bugs emerging from caves. As a result, [PAWN_possessive] body adapted to the insect poison.
LanguageData.GiantWrestler.title: Giant Wrestler
LanguageData.GiantWrestler.baseDescription: Wrestling is the most popular sports amongst the Giants, and [PAWN_nameDef] is an expert!
LanguageData.GiantChampion.title: Giant Champion
LanguageData.GiantChampion.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a veteran warrior who has been through countless wars against other races.
LanguageData.ThrumboSlayer.title: Thrumbo Slayer
LanguageData.ThrumboSlayer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a great thrumbo slayer, who struck down many thrumbos.
LanguageData.NomadicWarrior.title: Giant Nomadic Warrior
LanguageData.NomadicWarrior.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a warrior from a Nomadic Giant tribe.
